questions.text: I have ambitious aims of making a difference.
I believe in my ability to achieve my goals.
I seek to understand different perspectives.
I often reflect on my personal values.
I actively pursue my passions and interests.
I feel overwhelmed by the challenges I face.
I often feel disillusioned with my current path.
I doubt my ability to make a significant impact.
I rarely feel a sense of accomplishment.
I feel cynical about people's intentions.
I struggle to stay motivated in difficult times.
I find it hard to stay positive in tough situations.
I often feel misunderstood.
I find it difficult to trust others.
I question the value of my efforts.
I am satisfied with my current progress in life.
I feel hopeful about my future.
I prioritize my well-being and mental health.
I feel hopeful about overcoming my challenges.
I often feel uncertain about my future.
